statements: SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraph
SELECT subject, predicate FROM KnowledgeGraph ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT object FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM KnowledgeGraph
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE subject='Machine Learning' LIMIT 10;
SELECT subject, predicate FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE object='Deep Learning' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_triples FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE predicate='is_a';
SELECT object, subject FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE predicate='related_to' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, subject, object FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE predicate='has_property' AND object='open-source';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph_nodes;
SELECT node_id, label FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT label FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE node_id = 'f5d52a9b-fabe-4e21-b598-cbc566f3e8b1';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph_nodes ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE label LIKE '%graph%';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE label = 'Person'
SELECT node_id, label FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT label FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE node_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001')
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph_nodes WHERE label LIKE 'C%' AND updated_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT label FROM knowledge_graph_nodes ORDER BY label ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeNodes;
SELECT node_label, node_properties FROM KnowledgeNodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT graph_name, graph_properties FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE graph_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeEdges WHERE edge_label = 'related_to';
SELECT from_node_id, to_node_id FROM KnowledgeEdges ORDER BY edge_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeNodes;
SELECT node_label, node_properties FROM KnowledgeNodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT from_node_id, edge_label, edge_properties FROM KnowledgeEdges WHERE to_node_id = 2 ORDER BY edge_id ASC;
SELECT graph_id, graph_name, created_date FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE graph_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT graph_id, graph_name, graph_properties FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE graph_name LIKE 'A%' AND created_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY graph_id;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeNodes;
SELECT node_name, node_type FROM KnowledgeNodes WHERE node_type='example';
SELECT node_name, node_type FROM KnowledgeNodes ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeEdges WHERE from_node_id=1;
SELECT edge_name, relationship_type FROM KnowledgeEdges WHERE relationship_type='related';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeNodes;
SELECT node_name, node_type FROM KnowledgeNodes WHERE node_type = 'concept';
SELECT attribute_name, attribute_value FROM KnowledgeAttributes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeEdges ORDER BY relationship_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_label FROM knowledge_nodes WHERE node_type = 'example';
SELECT node_id, node_label, node_type FROM knowledge_nodes ORDER BY node_label DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_edges WHERE relation_label = 'related';
SELECT source_node_id, target_node_id FROM knowledge_edges WHERE source_node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_nodes WHERE node_type = 'concept';
SELECT node_label, node_type FROM knowledge_nodes ORDER BY node_label DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%date%';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_edges WHERE source_node_id = 'fb682d4c-4d57-4f40-9c7d-568d64e0a848' AND target_node_id = '48df40eb-ee07-4fa9-bd5e-43e51a5d3a77';
SELECT graph_id, graph_name, COUNT(*) FROM knowledge_graphs GROUP BY graph_id, graph_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
